Otyeno me nino meno, ma en nino mukwoŋo me cabit, ma kun gicego doggola ka ma lupwonnye gucokke iye, pi lworo Lujudaya, Yecu obino, ocuŋ i dyegi, owaco ki gin ni, “Kuc obed botwu.” Ka owaco lok man, ci onyuttigi ciŋe ki lakŋete. Lupwonnye cwinygi obedo yom ka guneno Rwot. Yecu dok owaco ki gin ni, “Kuc obed botwu. Macalo Won ceŋ oora, an bene aorowu.” Ka en owaco man, ci oywe i komgi, owaco ki gin ni, “Wugam Cwiny Maleŋ. 20.23: Mat 16.19; 18.18Ka wugonyo bal pa ŋat mo, ci doŋ gigonyo; ka pe wugonyo bal pa ŋat mo, ci doŋ pe gigonyo.”
Tomaci okwero ye

Tomaci, ŋat acel i kin jo apar wiye aryo, ma gilwoŋo ni Baŋi, onoŋo pe botgi i kare ma Yecu obino. Lupwonnye mukene gutitte ni, “Waneno Rwot.” Ento en odok iye ki gin ni, “Ka pe aneno poyo me cumar i ciŋe, ki keto nyig ciŋa i waŋ poyo me cumar, ki keto ciŋa i lakŋete, pe abiye kadi matidi mo.”

Ka nino aboro okato, lupwonnyene doki gubedo i ot, Tomaci bene onoŋo tye kwedgi. Onoŋo gucego doggola, ento Yecu obino, ocuŋ i dyegi, owaco ni, “Kuc obed botwu.” Lacen owaco bot Tomaci ni, “Cwal nyig ciŋi kany, inen ciŋa; rye ciŋi, iket i lakŋeta; iwek bedo ma pe iye, ento ma ye.” Tomaci ogamo ni, “In i Rwoda ki Lubaŋana” Yecu openye ni, “Pien inena omiyo iye? Tye ki gum dano ma pe guneno, ma guye.”
Lok mumiyo gicoyo buk man
Yecu otiyo lanyut mapol i nyim lupwonnyene, ma pe gicoyogi i buk man. Ento magi gicoyo wek wuye ni, Yecu en Kricito ma Lubaŋa oyero, Wod pa Lubaŋa, ci ka wuye, wek wubed ki kwo i nyiŋe.
Yecu onen bot lupwonnye abiro

Ka man otum, Yecu dok onyutte bot lupwonnyene i dog nam Tiberia, onyutte kit man. Cimon Petero, Tomaci ma gilwoŋo ni Baŋi, Natanael me Kana me Galilaya, litino pa Jebedayo ki jo aryo mukene i kin lupwonnyene onoŋo gitye kacel. 21.3: Luka 5.5Cimon Petero owaco ki gin ni, “Acito ka mako rec.” Gugamo doge ni, “Wan wacito kwedi.” Gucito, gudonyo i yeya; ento i dyewor meno pe gumako gin mo.

Ka piny pud oru aruya, Yecu ocuŋ i wi tera, ento lupwonnyene pe giŋeyo ni en Yecu. Yecu openyogi ni, “Litino, wunoŋo dek mo twal?” Gudokke iye ni, “Pe”. 21.6: Luka 5.6En owaccigi ni, “Wubol obwo tuŋ malacuc me yeya, ci wubinoŋo.” Gubolo, tiŋo obwo oŋayogi pi pol rec. Lapwonnye meno ma Yecu maro owaco ki petero ni, “Meno Rwot!” Ka Cimon Petero owinyo ni meno Rwot, oruko boŋŋine, pien onoŋo ogonyogi woko pi tic, okworre i nam. Ento lupwonnye mukene gubino i yeya, kun giywayo obwo ma opoŋ ki rec, pien onoŋo pe gibor ki wi tera, mito romo tyen miya acel.

Ka doŋ gukatti woko i wi tera, guneno mac miri kunnu, ma giketo rec i wiye, ki mugati. Yecu owaccigi ni, “Wukel rec mogo ma pud wumako amaka-ni.” Cimon Petero oito i yeya, oywayo obwo, okelo i wi tera, kun opoŋ ki rec madito, miya acel ki pyerabic wiye adek. Kadi bed gipol ento obwo pe oyec.Cimon Petero…oywayo obwo okelo i wi tera Yecu owaccigi ni, “Wubin ka cam.” Pe tye ŋat mo i kin lupwonnye ma odiyo cwinye me penye ni, “In aŋa?” Pien giŋeyo ni en Rwot. Yecu obino, okwanyo mugati, opokkigi, ki rec bene kit meno. Man doŋ tyen me adekke ma Yecu onyutte kwede bot lupwonnyene, ma doŋ en ocer ki i kin jo muto.
Kwa romina

Ka doŋ gicamo otum, Yecu openyo Cimon Petero ni, “Cimon wod pa Jon, in imara makato jo-ni?” En ogamo ni, “Iyo, Rwot, in iŋeyo an amari.” Ocike ni, “Kwa litino romina.” Openye tyen me aryo ni, “Cimon wod pa Jon, in imara?” En ogamo ni, “Iyo Rwot, in iŋeyo an amari.” Ocike ni, “Gwok romina.” Dok openye tyen me adekke ni, “Cimon wod pa Jon, in imara?” Petero okumo pien openye tyen me adekke ni, “Imara?” Owacce ni, “Rwot, in iŋeyo jami ducu; in iŋeyo an amari.” Yecu ocike ni, “Kwa romina. Adada awacci ni, ka ceŋ in pud awobi, itweyo boŋoni keni, iwoto ka ma imito; ento ka doŋ iti, ibiryeyo badi, ci ŋat mukene bitweni boŋoni, biteri ka ma pe imito.” Owaco man pi nyuto kit to ma en biketo kwede deyo i kom Lubaŋa. Ka oloko lok man, owacce ni, “Luba.”
Lapwonnye ma Yecu maro

21.20: Jon 13.25 Petero olokke, oneno lapwonnye meno ma Yecu maro kun lubogi, en aye ŋat ma ceŋ ojeŋŋe i kor Yecu i dog cam me otyeno, ma owaco ni, “Rwot, aŋa ma bidobi?” Ka Petero onene, openyo Yecu ni, “Rwot, danoni kono?” Yecu owacce ni, “Ka amito ni en ori nio ka abidwogo, ilaro aŋo iye? In luba.” Lok man oywek i kin utmego, ni lapwonnye man pe bito; ento Yecu ceŋ pe owaco ni en pe bito, ento ni, “Ka amito ni en ori nio ka abidwogo, ilaro aŋo iye?”
Man aye lapwonnye ma obedo caden i kom lok magi, dok ocoyogi; wan bene waŋeyo ni lok ma en obolo obedo ada.
Lok me agikki
Tye bene gin mukene mapol ma Yecu otiyo; ka kono gicoyogi ki acel acel, atamo ni kadi lobo kulu pe twero romo buk ma gicoyo.
